attributes.action: Tell us how much extra advisers will cost taxpayers when you have to sack them after losing next election.
attributes.additional_details: These are party political activists furthering the cause of the party, and NOT the country and CERTAINLY not the electorate and, as such, it should be illegal for them to be paid out of taxpayer pounds.  THE MUST BE PAID FOR BY THE POLITICAL PARTY THEY REPRESENT AND WORK FOR.
